posts.author: Dzmitry
posts.content:
OK, I have a question here: what is Adventurers’ Guild, does it work now, how and where can people play it? Read a short article about it few years ago, but still don't know what is it...

Thanks.

posts.author: Mithril Jack
posts.content:
Doing a quick web search of the game yields sites for game clubs, game stores, a LARP society a WoW alliance guild, and on and on ad nauseum. I did find one game site (there may be others, my search resulted in 30 pages of hits and I only looked at the first two) which could be what you are referring to.

http://www.advguild.com/AGpage.html

Unfortunately the game is on hiatus. I hope this helps.
